com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface RegistrationService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface RegistrationService
extends Service

A service to provide automatic registration for agents, removing the need to manually write large amounts of boilerplate code.

This service provides a collection of convenience methods for agent developers who wish to register one or more interfaces with the Glue code and receive callbacks.

Since:
5.2.0

Method Summary
 void registerAllListeners(java.lang.Object listener)
          Automatically register every implemented listener interface with Glue.
 void unregisterAllListeners(java.lang.Object listener)
          Automatically unregister every implemented listener interface from Glue.
 

Method Detail

registerAllListeners

void registerAllListeners(java.lang.Object listener)
Automatically register every implemented listener interface with Glue.

This method inspects the interfaces implemented by listener and registers it with the appropriate interface. It is shorthand for performing the following: 

 class Listener implements AService.Listener, AnotherService.Listener, ... {
     // implementation
 };

 AService aService = serviceFactory.getService(AService.class);
 aService.registerListener(listener);

 AnotherService anotherService = serviceFactory.getService(AnotherService.class);
 anotherService.registerListener(listener);

 // repeat for all listener interfaces

Note that this method does not throw any ServiceFactory.ServiceNotAvailable exceptions. If a service is not available it will be logged as a WARN but this method will not fail. If more fine-grained control is required then it is recommended to manually register listeners and perform error checking there.

Parameters:
listener - The object implementing one ore more listener interfaces

unregisterAllListeners

void unregisterAllListeners(java.lang.Object listener)
Automatically unregister every implemented listener interface from Glue.

This undoes the operation performed by registerAllListeners(java.lang.Object)

Parameters:
listener - The object implementing one or more listener interfaces
